DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , unmasked , randomized evaluation iStent patient primary open-angle glaucoma . Patients randomize one two group : 1 ) iStent , 2 ) medication .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation iStent Versus Two Ocular Hypotensive Agents Patients With Primary Open-angle Glaucoma ( POAG )
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred patient enrol study 21 clinical site ; follow-up 1 year .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis primary openangle glaucoma Male female least 18 year age able provide write informed consent Mean IOP ( baseline visit washout medication ) must 22 mm Hg great 38 mm Hg Likely available willing attend followup visit Angle closure glaucoma Secondary glaucoma Prior glaucoma procedure Elevated episcleral venous pressure history active thyroid orbitopathy , carotidcavernous fistula , orbital tumor , orbital congestive disease
